AI Description: NAMD (NAnoscale Molecular Dynamics) is a parallel molecular dynamics code designed for high-performance simulation of large biomolecular systems. It is optimized for the simulation of biomolecular systems containing millions of atoms.
Core Features: High-Performance Molecular Dynamics Simulation, Parallel Computing Support, Optimized For Large Biomolecular Systems, Compatible With Cuda For Gpu Acceleration
General Tags: Molecular Dynamics, Biomolecular Systems, Parallel Computing, Cuda, Simulation
